name: transloadit-jquery
description: Integrate Transloadit's uploading and encoding capabilites into browsers using jQuery

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run css && npm run browserify && npm run uglify && npm run gzip && npm run versionify
scripts.css: mkdir -p build/css/img && cp css/transloadit2.css build/css/transloadit2-latest.css && cp -v css/img/* build/css/img/
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run css && npm run browserify && npm run inject
scripts.inject: cp -v build/*.css ${WEBSITEDIR:-~/code/crm}/app/webroot/jquery-sdk/css/ && cp -v css/img/* ${WEBSITEDIR:-~/code/crm}/app/webroot/jquery-sdk/css/img/ && cp -v build/*.js* ${WEBSITEDIR:-~/code/crm}/app/webroot/jquery-sdk/js
scripts.release: npm version ${SEMANTIC:-patch} -m "Release %s" && git push --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.test: source env.sh && (./node_modules/.bin/jscs --fix js/lib tests/ || true) && npm run lint && tests/run.sh
scripts.versionify: cd build && for file in *.*; do cp -v ${file} $(echo ${file} |sed "s/latest/v$(npm run --silent version)/g" ); done

author: Transloadit
